title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 August 2014 - XWiki
content:
<cjd> has joined #xwiki  
00:47 <cjd> has quit  
00:51 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
01:19 <lucaa> has quit  
01:34 <cjd> has quit

08:57 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki

09:41 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <evalica> has quit  
09:46 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <vfzevaze1> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <vfzevaze> has quit  
10:27 <Lyes1> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:58 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <vmassol> Denis: hi, just seen http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Blame+Module is this part of platform? If so the author should probably be "XWiki Development Team", no?  
11:04 <Denis> Yes, you are righ  
11:04 <Denis> t  
11:05 <vmassol> going back to the beach now :)  
11:06 <Denis> vmassol: it is also annoying that we cannot import it  
11:06 <Denis> at the time we close the issue, the module is usually in snapshot  
11:06 <vmassol> Denis: actually it's possible with some trick I think, but we need to ask thomas (we used to import them in the past)  
11:07 <Denis> I seen Thomas has not recently at least  
11:07 <vmassol> there's nothinh preventing us from importing  
11:07 <Denis> the diff module has not the right ID for exemple  
11:07 <vmassol> thomas just removed the snapshot repo from the list  
11:07 <Denis> that is the proble  
11:07 <Denis> m  
11:08 <vmassol> anyway you/we should ask him when he's back  
11:08 <Denis> I will talk with him when he is back  
11:08 <Denis> :)  
11:48 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <vmassol> has quit  
12:35 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
12:41 <vfzevaze1> hello guys! could someone maybe please create the repo "macro-redmine" under xwiki-contrib on github? (http://lists.xwiki.org/pipermail/devs/2014-August/057180.html)  
13:58 <lucaa> hello XWikiers  
13:58 <lucaa> is the XWiki build supposed to work on open jdk java?  
13:58 <lucaa> I get this when trying to build platform administration ui  
13:58 <lucaa> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.xwiki.commons:xwiki-commons-tool-xar-plugin:6.2-SNAPSHOT:format (default-cli) on project xwiki-platform-administration-ui: Unable to execute mojo: Execution null of goal com.mycila:license-maven-plugin:2.6:format failed: Plugin com.mycila:license-maven-plugin:2.6 or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: Could not find artifact com.sun:tools:jar:1.5.0 at specified path /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk  
14:00 <Denis> not nice, I would file an issue on the dev only component if I were you  
14:00 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <Slashman\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:04 <Slashman> has quit  
14:04 <Denis> seems the licence-maven-plugin is linked to the sun JDK which is poor obviously  
14:08 <cjd> has quit  
14:11 <lucaa> I am asking because I know some committers are using open jdk  
14:11 <lucaa> and I was wondering how...  
14:12 <lucaa> but maybe I remember badly about committers using open jdk  
14:13 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <vfzevaze1> @lucaa i am running xwiki-e.6.0.1 with openjdk 1.7.0\_65 on debian 7 with any problems...  
14:23 <vfzevaze1> OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.5.1) (7u65-2.5.1-2~deb7u1)  
14:24 <sburjan> has quit  
14:27 <lucaa> vfzevaze1: I was more thinking about using for development, not only running  
14:30 <cjd> com.sun:tools:jar is a stupid proprietary thing that makes compressed jars and Sun never released it so compiling certain things w/o sun's special secret java version isn't possible  
14:30 <cjd> solution: grab com.sub:tools:jar and put it in maven :D  
14:35 <Denis> has quit  
14:35 <vmassol> has quit  
14:44 <cjd> has quit  
14:49 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:59 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

15:07 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
15:09 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
15:09 <Slashman\_> hello, I didn't find any link to donate to the xwiki project, am I missing something?  
15:32 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <evalica> Slashman\_: we used to have a way to make donations, but that website closed. So I don't remember any way how you could do donations. I might be mistaken.  
15:35 <Slashman\_> evalica: too bad  
15:39 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:40 <vmassol> has quit  
15:41 <Enygma`> lucaa: I`m using openjdk for development without issues  
15:41 <Enygma`> xwiki-platform-administration-ui building fine as well  
15:45 <Enygma`> lucaa: both http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5756299/maven-3-artifact-problem/5756446#5756446 and https://github.com/thickpaddy/jenkins\_campfire\_plugin/issues/12 suggest it might be a setup issue with your jdk setup (JAVA\_HOME)  
15:45 <vfzevaze1> has left #xwiki
